channel.title: [SRL][RS2] Fight Caves AFK Trainer [SCAR 2.03]
channel.description:
[b][size=4]Version: BETA 1.6.1[/size][/b] [i]Chat fixer added to adjust user to recomended script settings.[/i] Alright, I've already posted most of the info on my site, so if you want to see the official download page for the script, then [url=http://dizzycoders.speedsoft.uni.cc/scar/scripts.php?id=1]click here[/url]. This is a remake of the original version - this time, using SRL. Before the script used the SSI2 include, which is now outdated BIG TIME. So I finnaly decided to upgrade! After testing the script with SRL, I was amazed. Everything seemed to run alot smoother (yes, that includes the mouse :P). So I thank the people for working hard on creating the ultimate include, SRL. Here's some info taken off of the site about the script:
Features: Logs in if you are logged out when you start the script. Special waitin procedures made for people who don't have a fast internet connection. Less laggy bitmap and color finding procedures. More accurate and faster AFK waiting procedure (Our main target of updating at the moment), Re-enters caves when you lose, A little slow but good login procedure (Slow on purpose for Dial-up users), will logout after a specified amount of rounds, IF wanted to: the script will log back in after sleeping for about 15-30 minutes. Etc..
Now, here's some info taken off of the script (on how to setup the script):
{.Setting up the script/recomended game settings: # We recomend leaving your private chat ON, or on FRIENDS. # The Cave Color rarely changes, so the pre-set color STILL WORKS. # We still recomend that you update the Cave Color atleast once a day. # The script can work on Normal brightness, but it's recomended that you # run the script on Very-Bright. # Setting up DeathTotal: In the setup form, you will see DeathTotal. # DeathTotal is how much times you want the script to enter the caves # (and most likely lose though). Once DeathTotal hits its Mark (whatever # number you set it to), the script will log your character off and take # a break. If you checked 'Log back in', then the script will log your # character back on, then reset the DeathTotal to the mark you set. # Therefor creating a loop. # The time the script takes a break for is RANDOM. From 15-30 minutes. # In the later versions, we will be adding Sleeper marks which will make # the script act like if you went to sleep for a while (as if you were # taking a cat nap, or actually sleeping for 2 hours). # ....................................................................../ If you need any help setting up the script or find any bugs/errors, then please contact us via email: [email]dizzycoders@yahoo.com[/email] # Thank you. /Setup Help}
If you need any help with the script or find and bugs/errors, then please contact me via email at: [email]dizzycoders@yahoo.com[/email] Thank you and have fun cheating, ~Dizzy [img]http://www.villu-reborn.com/images/smilies/spongebob.gif[/img]

It’s a safe script to use. If you do not trust me, then just don’t use the script at all.
P.S. You listen to freezepop? Lol.

Also:
I know it’s not a cool thing to bump/bring back old threads, but I just wanted to see how my ancient old scripts were doing, lol.

item.title: [SRL][RS2] Fight Caves AFK Trainer [SCAR 2.03]
item.dc:creator: @Faile Faile
item.description:
@Faile wrote:

I have had some problems with this script and i think its to do with random detection, i have been caught by the frog and twise ended up dead the second time i lost 300K tokkel so im a bit miffed about that but nothing to worry about… i cant provide any reports becuse bro often closes it down. He says however it often ownly makes it about half way through before ending.

although i suppose it could be my chars white hair

it dose look like a good script though and i seem to be the ownly one haveing problems so…

Read full topic

item.title: [SRL][RS2] Fight Caves AFK Trainer [SCAR 2.03]
item.dc:creator: @Dizzy Dizzy
item.description:
@Dizzy wrote:

[quote=“bobert5696, post:5, topic:48421”]just curious, not to compete, or advertise my script for sale, but does this move around the fight caves if your not being attacked, you say that it waits a random time, not a good idea, you will probably be banned, for loggining in and out, because AFK’ing is against the ruiles, and if they didnt detect you were macroing, it may very well look liek you were afk’ing… and back to the walking aroumd, if all you have it do is enter the arena, and wait, once it gets to a point, it will stop working, this i know from expereice, i had to write many procedures to make sure that you never get stuck, and that your never waiting for more than 3-5 seconds before it detects your not in the cave anymore, and it will take you back in…

just my concerns about the script, and the anti-ban ness of it[/quote]

Well yea, I’ve been thinking about that. I’ve also been working on a better waiting procedure that is nearly constantly checking if you’re not in the caves, fighting, etc., which would also be less laggy.

Also, this is the FREE version of the script, so I don’t plan to make this script too good.

Thanks for reminding me about walking around the caves though.

Read full topic

item.title: [SRL][RS2] Fight Caves AFK Trainer [SCAR 2.03]
item.dc:creator: @bobert5696 bobert5696
item.description:
@bobert5696 wrote:

just curious, not to compete, or advertise my script for sale, but does this move around the fight caves if your not being attacked, you say that it waits a random time, not a good idea, you will probably be banned, for loggining in and out, because AFK’ing is against the ruiles, and if they didnt detect you were macroing, it may very well look liek you were afk’ing… and back to the walking aroumd, if all you have it do is enter the arena, and wait, once it gets to a point, it will stop working, this i know from expereice, i had to write many procedures to make sure that you never get stuck, and that your never waiting for more than 3-5 seconds before it detects your not in the cave anymore, and it will take you back in…

just my concerns about the script, and the anti-ban ness of it

Read full topic

item.title: [SRL][RS2] Fight Caves AFK Trainer [SCAR 2.03]
item.dc:creator: @Dizzy Dizzy
item.description:
@Dizzy wrote:

[quote=“srathek, post:2, topic:48421”]I am gonna check it out right now, if it works good I might buy the version you are selling

Edit:Didn’t work well after I died once it wouldn’t enter the cave again[/quote]

You have to wait a bit. It sleeps for random amount of time THEN checks for all of the bitmaps, colors, etc.

That’s why I’m fixing the sleeping procedure, so it checks if it lost more often, but it might make the script a little laggy.

Oh and for the errors, urlali, I’ve gotten those fixed. Just give me a bit to upload the script.

Read full topic

item.title: [SRL][RS2] Fight Caves AFK Trainer [SCAR 2.03]
item.dc:creator: @Dizzy Dizzy
item.description:
@Dizzy wrote:

[size=4]Version: BETA 1.6.1[/size]
Chat fixer added to adjust user to recomended script settings.

Alright, I’ve already posted most of the info on my site, so if you want to see the official download page for the script, then click here.

This is a remake of the original version - this time, using SRL.
Before the script used the SSI2 include, which is now outdated BIG TIME. So I finnaly decided to upgrade! After testing the script with SRL, I was amazed. Everything seemed to run alot smoother (yes, that includes the mouse :P).

So I thank the people for working hard on creating the ultimate include, SRL.

Here’s some info taken off of the site about the script:

Features: Logs in if you are logged out when you start the script. Special waitin procedures made for people who don't have a fast internet connection. Less laggy bitmap and color finding procedures. More accurate and faster AFK waiting procedure (Our main target of updating at the moment), Re-enters caves when you lose, A little slow but good login procedure (Slow on purpose for Dial-up users), will logout after a specified amount of rounds, IF wanted to: the script will log back in after sleeping for about 15-30 minutes. Etc..

Now, here’s some info taken off of the script (on how to setup the script):

{.Setting up the script/recomended game settings: # We recomend leaving your private chat ON, or on FRIENDS. # The Cave Color rarely changes, so the pre-set color STILL WORKS. # We still recomend that you update the Cave Color atleast once a day. # The script can work on Normal brightness, but it's recomended that you # run the script on Very-Bright. # Setting up DeathTotal: In the setup form, you will see DeathTotal. # DeathTotal is how much times you want the script to enter the caves # (and most likely lose though). Once DeathTotal hits its Mark (whatever # number you set it to), the script will log your character off and take # a break. If you checked 'Log back in', then the script will log your # character back on, then reset the DeathTotal to the mark you set. # Therefor creating a loop. # The time the script takes a break for is RANDOM. From 15-30 minutes. # In the later versions, we will be adding Sleeper marks which will make # the script act like if you went to sleep for a while (as if you were # taking a cat nap, or actually sleeping for 2 hours). # ....................................................................../

If you need any help setting up the script or find any bugs/errors,
then please contact us via email:

          [email]dizzycoders@yahoo.com[/email]

Thank you.

/Setup Help}

If you need any help with the script or find and bugs/errors, then please contact me via email at: dizzycoders@yahoo.com

Thank you and have fun cheating,
~Dizzy

Read full topic
